message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to be extremely valuable, worth well over a million dollars to me. While I can't disclose the specifics at this time, I'm confident it will be of significant interest to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, as another buyer is already waiting in the wings.  Let me know your decision by [Date/Time].
